knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
world_region_data <- read_delim("data/World_Region_Data/world_region_data.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```
```{r}
world_region_data2 <- read_delim("data/World_Region_Data/world_region_data2.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```
```{r}
dataset <- merge(x = world_region_data, y = world_region_data2, by = "Year", all = TRUE)
```

## Visualise dataset
```{r}
colnames(dataset)

```

```{r}
# Nuage de points simples
ggplot(dataset) + geom_point(aes(x=Year, y=WorldNI))+ geom_point(aes(x=Year, y=AfricaNI),color="orange") + geom_point(aes(x=Year, y=AsiaNI),color="red")+ geom_point(aes(x=Year, y=AmericasNI),color="blue")
```
